column2: Join us, please, when you have time
column3: Join us, please, when you have time

column2: Just trust to the inspiration of the moment
column3: Just trust to the inspiration of the moment

column2: Justify it if you can
column3: Justify it if you can

column2: Let me persuade you
column3: Let me persuade you

column2: Let me say how deeply indebted I feel for your kindness
column3: Let me say how deeply indebted I feel for your kindness

column2: Let me speak frankly
column3: Let me speak frankly

column2: Many thanks--how kind and good you are!
column3: Many thanks-how kind and good you are!

column2: May I ask to whom you allude?
column3: May I ask to whom you allude?

column2: May I be privileged to hear it?
column3: May I be privileged to hear it?

column2: May I speak freely?
column3: May I speak freely?

column2: Most dangerous!
column3: Most dangerous!

column2: My attitude would be one of disapproval
column3: My attitude would be one of disapproval

column2: My idea of it is quite the reverse
column3: My idea of it is quite the reverse

column2: No, I am speaking seriously
column3: No, I am speaking seriously

column2: No, I don't understand it
column3: No, I don't understand it

column2: Not at all
column3: Not at all

column2: Now is it very plain to you?
column3: Now is it very plain to you?

column2: Now you are flippant
column3: Now you are flippant

column2: Of course I am delighted
column3: Of course I am delighted

column2: Of course you will do what you think best
column3: Of course you will do what you think best

column2: Oh, do not form an erroneous impression
column3: Oh, do not form an erroneous impression

column2: Oh, that's mere quibbling
column3: Oh, that's mere quibbling

column2: Oh, that was a manner of speaking
column3: Oh, that was a manner of speaking

column2: Oh, yes, I quite admit that
column3: Oh, yes, I quite admit that

column2: Oh, yes, you may take that for granted
column3: Oh, yes, you may take that for granted

column2: On the contrary, I agree with you thoroughly
column3: On the contrary, I agree with you thoroughly

column2: One assumption you make I should like to contest
column3: One assumption you make I should like to contest

column2: One must be indulgent under the circumstances
column3: One must be indulgent under the circumstances

column2: One thing I beg of you
column3: One thing I beg of you

column2: Pardon me, I meant something different
column3: Pardon me, I meant something different

column2: Perhaps not in the strictest sense
column3: Perhaps not in the strictest sense

column2: Perhaps you think me ungrateful
column3: Perhaps you think me ungrateful

column2: Please continue to be frank
column3: Please continue to be frank

column2: Pray don't apologize
column3: Pray don't apologize

column2: Pray go on!
column3: Pray go on!

column2: Precisely, that is just what I meant
column3: Precisely, that is just what I meant

column2: Quibbling, I call it

column2: Quite so

column2: Really?

column3: Really-you must go?

column2: Shall we have a compact?
column3: Shall we have a compact?

column2: She seems uncommonly appreciative
column3: She seems uncommonly appreciative

column2: Show me that the two cases are analogous
column3: Show me that the two cases are analogous

column2: So I inferred

column2: So much the better for me

column3: Speaking with all due respect

column3: Still, you might make an exception

column3: Such conduct seems to me unjustifiable
